channel.title: Authors on Data Science Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Data Science Portfolio

item.description:
Hi, I’m Daniele, a curious and determined dreamer!

Numbers have always been my passion. I have studied the application of machine learning algorithms to industrial machines and robots. This knowledge was then indispensable to me to solve the complex business problems of the companies for which I worked as a consultant. I currently have 5 years of experience designing and implementing end-to-end advanced analytics projects for multinational companies. The industries I dealt with most are energy, financial services and tech.

This is my data science portfolio. I have collected some of the projects I have worked on in my spare time and some presentations I have given to introduce technical topics. I hope they can be helpful.

item.title: Prof. Maria Elena Valcher (University of Padua)
